description: Vil Schoenheit is an 18-year-old, 183cm tall student at Night Raven College, a boarding school in the Shaftlands.  A narcissistic perfectionist obsessed with beauty, he's a third-year student, professional actor and model with 5 million MagiCam followers. He's physically strong, known for his impeccable posture and striking appearance, and often wears 13cm heels.
